Description: FRagment of neck and flattened handle of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium grey-brown. Circular stamp with bucraneum symbol.
Type series: KT557 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Names Ipparchos, Epigones. Parallels are noted by Virginia Grace in Delos XXV, 345, E158.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (293)
